org.svvrl.goal.core.comp

Interface ComplementConstruction<I extends Automaton,O extends Automaton>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of the input automaton to be complemented
    O - the tyoe of the complement automaton
    All Superinterfaces:
    Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm, java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComplementConstruction, AbstractSliceComplement, ClassicComplement, DeterministicComplementConstruction, KurshanConstruction, ModifiedSafraConstruction, MullerSchuppConstruction, PitermanConstruction, RamseyConstruction, RankConstruction, SafraConstruction, ScheweConstruction, SliceConstruction, SliceKWConstruction, SliceVWConstruction, WAAConstruction, WAPAConstruction

    public interface ComplementConstruction<I extends Automaton,O extends Automaton>
extends EditableAlgorithm
    A ComplementConstruction object is an implementation of a complementation construction that can complement an automaton into another automaton which accepts the complement language. Every ComplementConstruction object is expected to be used once.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      O complement()
      Performs the complementation and returns the complement.
      I getInput()
      Returns the automaton to be complemented.
